name: Allegiance to Cenarion Circle
tooltip:
Allegiance to Cenarion Circle

Even if you have no need for the material rewards we offer, these badges still mark our mutual trust and friendship.

Bring them to me.  I'll make due note of your service should your performance go above and beyond the call of duty.

Requirements:
- Cenarion Combat Badge
- Cenarion Logistics Badge
- Cenarion Tactical Badge
